messages.content: Welcome! How can I assist you today?
Hello! I'm JacQues, your assistant. I'm here to help answer your questions. What's on your mind?
I am JacQues, your friendly assistant. I'm here to help answer your questions and provide information on a wide range of topics. Please feel free to ask me anything!
Please Jacques tell me a joke without searching on Internet.
Here's a joke for you: Why couldn't the bicycle stand up by itself? Because it was two-tired!
What is your purpose? please answers using only action words.
